caption:
🗣️ Lionel Messi (in 2009): “I would pay to watch Manchester United’s Cristiano Ronaldo!” 🐐⬇️

“Manchester United have quality everywhere, so many good players. But if I had to pick one, it would be Cristiano Ronaldo!”

“He and I are very different players but he is unbelievable, very special, and it will not be easy to stop him.” 🥹❤️

The GOATS have always admired & respected each other from day one! 🐐🤝🐐

Throwback to Cristiano Ronaldo’s 2007/08 season: 

🏟️ 49 Games
🚀 42 Goals
🎯 8 Assists
🏆 Premier League winner
🏆 Champions League winner
🥇 Ballon d’Or 
🥇 Premier League Player of the Year
🥇 PFA Team of the Year
🥇 PFA Players’ Player of the Year
🥇 PFA Young Player of the Year
📈 Premier League top scorer
📈 Champions League top scorer
